title: From Self Centered to God Centered
description: We have a problem with Christianity today â€“ the focus is not on others and the work of the Lord but it is on ourselves. K.P. Yohannan challenges us with this question: â€œWhat does it mean to be like Jesus?â€ How many of us will actually take time and intercede for the nations? Weep over the unreached world and seek to do something to help aide in the Gospel being preached? How many of us will take a day or two and fast and pray for the lost? Like the scriptures say, we are to come and follow Jesus, live like Him and what He lived for.
